comments:
I have tried to out my report to PDF but had an error :
root cause  java.lang.LinkageError: loader constraint violation: when resolving interface method "org.eclipse.birt.report.engine.content.IStyle.getProperty(I Lorg/w3c/dom/css/CSSValue;" the class loader (instance of org/eclipse/osgi/internal/baseadaptor/DefaultClassLoader) of the current 
class, org/eclipse/birt/report/engine/emitter/pdf/PDFEmitter$PDFRender, and 
the class loader (instance of 
org/eclipse/osgi/internal/baseadaptor/DefaultClassLoader) for resolved 
class, org/eclipse/birt/report/engine/content/IStyle, have different Class 
objects for the type org/w3c/dom/css/CSSValue used in the signature
 at org.eclipse.birt.report.engine.emitter.pdf.PDFEmitter$PDFRender.newPage(PDFEmitter.java:652)
 at org.eclipse.birt.report.engine.emitter.pdf.PDFEmitter$PDFRender.startContainer(PDFEmitter.java:585)
...

It is unrepeatable on BIRT "allinone" installation. But I use the next configuration:

eclipse-SDK-3.3M5eh-win32.zip
birt-report-framework-sdk-2.2M5.zip
emf-sdo-xsd-SDK-2.3.0M5.zip
emft-query-SDK-1.1M5.zip
emft-transaction-SDK-1.1M5.zip
emft-validation-SDK-1.1M5.zip
GEF-ALL-3.3M5.zip
GMF-sdk-2.0M5.zip
mdt-ocl-SDK-1.1M5.zip
uml2-SDK-2.1M5.zip

jre1.5.0_09

itext-1.4.6.jar

All extensions are linked to eclipse. If all extensions are installed all 
together with eclipse - result the same. To get PDF I tried to "View report 
as PDF" and ""View report in Web Viewer"->"Print as PDF" both failed.

I have found similar case in 
http://dev.eclipse.org/mhonarc/lists/birt-dev/msg07002.html with a solution 
to trow out the xerces plugin. As result of applying this solution a lot 
modules could not start but I got ability to see my report in PDF format. I 
guess should be some less destructive sollution.

I can not reproduce this issue at:
eclipse-SDK-3.3M5eh-win32.zip
emf-sdo-xsd-SDK-2.3.0M5.zip
GEF-SDK-3.3M5.zip
birt-report-framework-sdk-2.2M5.zip

is this issue duplicated with 173816?
Could you tell me the version number of plugin org.eclipse.birt.report.engine ?

org.eclipse.birt.report.engine_2.2.0.v20070206.jar 
Yes this bug is duplicate of 173816.

*** This bug has been marked as a duplicate of bug 173816 ***

traces.message: loader constraint violation: when resolving interface method "org.eclipse.birt.report.engine.content.IStyle.getProperty(I Lorg/w3c/dom/css/CSSValue;" the class loader (instance of org/eclipse/osgi/internal/baseadaptor/DefaultClassLoader) of the current  class, org/eclipse/birt/report/engine/emitter/pdf/PDFEmitter$PDFRender, and  the class loader (instance of  org/eclipse/osgi/internal/baseadaptor/DefaultClassLoader) for resolved  class, org/eclipse/birt/report/engine/content/IStyle, have different Class  objects for the type org/w3c/dom/css/CSSValue used in the signature
